name: Lantern Light
text: Your thrown weapons become pure light, overcoming enemy defenses.
prerequisites: Lantern Style, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, good or lawful alignment, caster level 7th or monk level 7th.
benefit: When you make a single ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon temporarily transforms into pure holy light, overcoming the target’s damage reduction, if any.
text_zh: 你投掷出的武器化为纯粹的光，忽略了敌人的防御能力。
prerequisites_zh: 流光式，近距射击，精准射击，守序或善良阵营，施法者等级7或者武僧等级7。
benefit_zh: 当你使用投掷武器进行单次远程攻击时（When you make a single ranged attack with a thrown weapon），该武器将暂时转化为纯净的圣光，克服目标的一切伤害减免（如果有的话）。
